name: camofox-mcp
description: Anti-detection browser automation MCP server. 18 tools wrapping CamoFox REST API with stealth fingerprinting that passes bot detection.

tools.name: camofox_server_status
tools.description: Check CamoFox server health and browser connection

tools.name: camofox_create_tab
tools.description: Create a new browser tab with anti-detection fingerprinting

tools.name: camofox_close_tab
tools.description: Close a browser tab and release resources

tools.name: camofox_list_tabs
tools.description: List all open browser tabs with URLs and titles

tools.name: camofox_navigate
tools.description: Navigate a tab to a URL

tools.name: camofox_click
tools.description: Click an element by ref or CSS selector

tools.name: camofox_type_text
tools.description: Type text into an input field by ref or CSS selector

tools.name: camofox_snapshot
tools.description: Get accessibility tree snapshot of page content

tools.name: camofox_screenshot
tools.description: Take visual screenshot as base64 PNG

tools.name: camofox_get_stats
tools.description: Get session statistics and performance metrics
